name: 3D Wooden Puzzle for Adults: Illuminated Globe with Stand & Built-in LED Music Box - 188PCs Model Kit for Home Decor
short_description: 【Elegant Home Decor & Ambient Lighting】 Elevate your living space with this stunning illuminated globe. Featuring an accurate world map and iconic landmark modules, it serves as a sophisticated centerpiece. The base includes a 12-constellation dial, adding a touch of celestial charm. When assembled, the warm LED lights create a serene ambiance, perfect for relaxing evenings as a unique night light or decorative lamp.

【Soothing Music & Stellar Projection】 Unwind with a built-in music box that offers 40 minutes of switchable, calming melodies to help you de-stress and focus. Enhance the atmosphere by projecting a clear image of the eight planets onto your ceiling, transforming your room into a personal planetarium for a truly immersive and tranquil experience.

【Satisfying & Engaging Build Experience】 Designed specifically for adults, this model kit utilizes a precise mortise and tenon joint structure—no glue required. We provide detailed, step-by-step instructions along with essential tools like a hammer and file to ensure a smooth, enjoyable, and rewarding assembly process. It's the perfect hands-on project to challenge your mind and relieve stress.

【A Premium Gift for Adults】 More than just a puzzle, this is a work of art. Crafted from high-quality wood, it offers a deeply relaxing and immersive building session. Packaged in a premier craft box, it makes an exceptional and memorable gift for birthdays, Christmas, or Thanksgiving for hobbyists, home decor enthusiasts, and anyone who appreciates intricate craftsmanship.

【Intellectual Stimulation & Conversation Piece】 This puzzle goes beyond mere assembly. It fosters a deeper appreciation for global geography, astronomy, and traditional woodworking techniques. The completed globe is not only a beautiful display but also a testament to your patience and skill, guaranteed to spark conversation among guests.

name: Ravensburger Glow-in-The-Dark Moon 72 Piece 3D Jigsaw Puzzle for Adults and Kids - 11586 - Great Gift for Any Birthday, Holiday, or Special Occasion
short_description: A decorative object that glows in the dark and inspires all space fans and moon enthusiasts: Thanks to phosphorescent plastic puzzle pieces, the 3D puzzle moon also glows in the dark.

The assembly of the 3D puzzle ball can be done by numbers (printed on the back of the pieces) or by the image. The high-quality plastic pieces can be easily assembled and provide three-dimensional puzzle fun for adults and children age 6 and older.

An impression of zero gravity: Whether it is placed on the shelf on the elegantly designed plastic stand, or hung with the supplied nylon cord – the lunar light is a sight to behold when it seems to float in the room.

Puzzle fun, easy and successful assembly: illustrated instructions, numbered puzzle pieces and Easyclick technology for perfect fit and a sturdy model with no glue required. For all fans of the night sky: the ideal birthday or Christmas present.

Difficulty Level 2/5; Diameter of the assembled Puzzle-Ball approx 12.9cm / 5 in. Contents: 72 curved plastic jigsaw puzzle pieces that are numbered on the back, base stand, nylon cord, assembly instructions
product_description: Is that moon floating in my room? It’s a possibility with this 3D Puzzle sphere of The Moon. And the 72 curved plastic jigsaw puzzle pieces that create the earth’s little satellite when assembled even glow softly in the dark! A fascinating sight that will bring a twinkle to your eyes. You can create a moonscape just like the original without any gluing. All space fans can admire the decorative floating object, whether it is placed atop the cleverly designed base stand or hung from the ceiling. With the puzzle ball “The Moon”, puzzle enthusiasts and full moon fans can recreate a miniature version of the moon in 3D and study it very closely. The puzzle pieces are numbered on the reverse side and provide a relaxing assembly experience either using the image side or the numbers to create a sturdy moon globe – without using any glue. Based on real footage from the Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter, the photographic images make this 3D puzzle sphere a super-realistic detailed replica of the original. When the room is brightly lit, the phosphorescent plastic pieces absorb the light and allow the mini moon to softly glow in the dark. Whether you place it on the smartly designed stand or hang it in the room with the supplied nylon cord, the decorative puzzle ball is a floating deco highlight in any room.
